document_data.name: Argosh
document_data.deathnotes: Slain in battle during the [[Fiend Wars]].
document_data.mainbody: King '''Argosh''', who was nicknamed '''the Scaled''', was the [[half-fiend]] ruler of [[Impiltur]] for several years in the 8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Argosh was the son of Duke [[Errendil Tarrik]], a prominent noble of Impiltur and secretly a [[fiend]] worshiper. Argosh was the direct result of a dalliance between his father and an other-wordly being.
document_data.Activities: Argosh claimed the throne of the kingdom after the death of King [[Forvar II]] in the {{YearlinkName|726}}. He held the throne for several years until the {{YearlinkName|729}}, when he was slain during the [[Fiend Wars]].
